text: Malcolm Fisher McKenzie Bogie (born 26 December 1939) was a Scottish professional footballer, who played as an inside forward. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Footballers from Edinburgh Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Hibernian F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Aldershot F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Living people Category:Stirling Albion F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:Gala Fairydean Rovers F.C. players Category:Hawick Royal Albert F.C. players
title: Malcolm Bogie
